item.title: Candidate found to be corrupt, removed from election
item.description: After the recent shocking events that occurred during the Attorney General debate yesterday, information involving candidate Ratat0ing has shown corruption after he pressured another candidate, Unknown_Err0rXD, to attack Toria, drop out of the election, and publicly endorse him.
